net.sf.sprockets.view

Class Views

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.view.Views

  • public class Views
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with Views.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static View gone(View view)
      Make the view gone if it isn't already.
      static View invisible(View view)
      Make the view invisible if it isn't already.
      static View measure(View view)
      Measure the View without any parent constraints.
      static View measure(View view, ViewGroup parent)
      Measure the View in its parent.
      static View visible(View view)
      Make the view visible if it isn't already.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • visible

        public static View visible(View view)
        Make the view visible if it isn't already.

      • invisible

        public static View invisible(View view)
        Make the view invisible if it isn't already.

      • gone

        public static View gone(View view)
        Make the view gone if it isn't already.

      • measure

        public static View measure(View view)
        Measure the View without any parent constraints. You can then call View.getMeasuredWidth() and View.getMeasuredHeight().
        Parameters:
        view - must have ViewGroup.LayoutParams

      • measure

        public static View measure(View view,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Measure the View in its parent. You can then call View.getMeasuredWidth() and View.getMeasuredHeight().
        Parameters:
        view - must have ViewGroup.LayoutParams
        parent - must already be measured
